Big Data\footnote{\tiny{Slide adapted from Hadley Wickham}}
==============================================
Size   | Description
------ | -------
Big    | Can't fit in memory on one computer: >5 TB
Medium | Fits in memory on a server: 10 GB - 5 TB
Small  | Fits in memory on a laptop: <10 GB

\begin{block}{Note:}
R is great at small!
\end{block}
